    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product(java.lang.String name,
               long id,
               int stock,
               double weight,
               java.lang.String weightUnit,
               double price,
               java.lang.String category)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new Product and initializes the attributes name, id, stock, weight, weightUnit, basePrice, category and price. It will also check if the parameters have correct values.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the product, must be between 2 and 32 characters
        id - the identification number of the product, has to be either 13 digits long, 4 digits long, or 5 digits with a leading 9
        stock - the stock of the product, has to be between 0 and 1000
        weight - the weight of a unit of the product has to be between 1 and 100.000 for gramm and ml, between 0,01 and 100 for l and kg and between 1 and 1000 for stück
        weightUnit - the unit of the given weight e.g. g,kg,ml,l,stück
        price - the price for a given amount of the product, between 0.01 and 100.000
        category - the category the product has been assigned to, has to be part of the category list
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - specified at each check

      • Product

        public Product(java.lang.String name,
               long id,
               java.lang.String specialStock,
               double weight,
               java.lang.String weightUnit,
               double basePrice,
               java.lang.String category)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new Product and initializes the attributes name, id, specialStock, weight, basePrice and category. It will also check if the parameters have correct values.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the product, must be between 2 and 32 characters
        id - the identification number of the product, has to be either 13 digits long, 4 digits long, or 5 digits with a leading 9
        specialStock - The special case where a product can not be counted, has to be either n or N
        weight - the weight of a unit of the product has to be between 1 and 100.000 for gramm and ml,between 0,01 and 100 for l and kg and between 1 and 1000 for stück
        weightUnit - the unit of the given weight e.g. g,kg,ml,l,stück
        basePrice - the price for a given unit of the product, between 0.01 and 100.000, eg. €/100g
        category - the category the product has been assigned to, has to be part of the category list
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - specified at each check

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets a new value for the name of the product. The name must be at least 2 and at most 32 symbols long. The name can consist of any symbol on a standard keyboard (DIN 2137-1:2018-12) Throws an exception if the name does not meet these requirements.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the product
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the name is shorter then 2 or longer then 32 Symbols

      • setId

        public void setId(long id)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets a new value for the identification number of the product which is the EAN or PLU. The id must be 13 digits long if it is an EAN. If it is a PLU it must be 4 or 5 digits long. If it is 5 digits long, the first digit must be a 9 For example an EAN looks like this 1234567890123, a PLU like this 1234 or 91234. Throws an exception if the id does not meet these requirements.
        Parameters:
        id - the number used to identify each unique product
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the id is not 13 or 4 digits long or 5 digits long and of the scheme 9XXXX

      • setStock

        public void setStock(int stock)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets a new value for the stock of the product. The stock must be a int, has to be between 0 and 1000 Throws an exception if the stock does not meet these requirements or the special case is activated for that product.
        Parameters:
        stock - the stock of the product, has to be between 0 and 1000
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the stock is smaller then 0 or greater then 1000 or special case is activated

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(double weight)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets a new value for the weight of the product. the weight of a unit of the product has to be between 1 and 100.000 for gramm and ml, between 0,01 and 100 for l and kg and between 1 and 1.000 for stück
        Parameters:
        weight - the weight of one unit of this product
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the weight is exceeds the respective weightUnit

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice(double price)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets a new value for the price of the product. The price must be a double between 0.01 and 100000 Throws an exception if the price does not meet these requirements.
        Parameters:
        price - the price charged for one unit of this product
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if price is less then 0.01 or greater then 100000

      • setBasePrice

        public void setBasePrice(double basePrice)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets a new value for the base price of the product. The base price must be a double 0.01 - 100.000 Throws an exception if the basePrice does not meet these requirements.
        Parameters:
        basePrice - the price charged for a fixed amount of this product
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the basePrice is less then 0.01 or greater then 100000 or special case is not activated

      • setCategory

        public void setCategory(java.lang.String category)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets a new value for the category of the product. Checks if the category already exits Throws an exception if the category does not meet these requirements.
        Parameters:
        category - the category this product has be assigned to
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the category does not already exists in categoryList

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the current value for the name of the product.
        Returns:
        the name of the product

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Returns the current value for the identification number of the product.
        Returns:
        the number used to identify each unique product

      • getStock

        public int getStock()
        Returns the current value for the stock of the product.
        Returns:
        the amount of units stored of this product

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight()
        Returns the current value for the weight of the product.
        Returns:
        the weight of one unit of this product

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        Returns the current value for the price of the product. This value is determined by setting the price in proportion to the actual weight. of a packed amount of this Product. For example if the base price of a Product is 1€/100g and a package of this product weighs 150g, then the actual price of the 150g package will be 1,50€
        Returns:
        the price charged for one unit of this product

      • getBasePrice

        public double getBasePrice()
        Returns the current value for the base price of the product. This value is determined by setting the price in proportion to a fix weight of this Product. For example how much do 100g of this product cost.
        Returns:
        the price charged for a fixed amount of this product

      • getCategory

        public java.lang.String getCategory()
        Returns the current value for the category of the product.
        Returns:
        the category this product has be assigned to

      • getWeightUnit

        public java.lang.String getWeightUnit()
        Returns the used weight unit, e.g. g/kg/ml/l/stück
        Returns:
        the weight unit by which the product is measured

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(java.lang.String specialStock)
        Returns a string of all product attributes.
        Parameters:
        specialStock - the specialStock attribute of the product that is turned into a string
        Returns:
        a concatenation of all product attributes as a string

      • getSpecialStock

        public java.lang.String getSpecialStock()
        Returns the specialStock, has to be n or N
        Returns:
        the value n or N that indicates that the special case ist activated
